name: Arduino Bird
description:
School project - Simple Flappy Bird clone made for Arduino using 8x8 matrix display with MAX7219, one button and LedControl library.

I wasn't sure if I should release it on Itch.io, because it's not a typical piece of interactive software, but why the heck not. If you have your Arduino lying around somewhere and rest of the requiered components, give it a try or just look up the code.

Warning
Probably not a good practice, but variables names etc. I wrote mostly in Polish, so be aware of that.

Controls:

  • Press the button to jump or start the game after you lose.

Components used:

  • Arduino Uno R2
  • 8x8 Matrix Display with MAX7219
  • Button
  • 220 Ohm Resistor
  • Bunch of cables

Useful links:

  • https://datasheets.maximintegrated.com/en/ds/MAX7219-MAX7221.pdf
  • http://wayoda.github.io/LedControl/
  • https://github.com/emkiusz/ArduinoBird
